title.value: Конструирование вакцины 'Триховак-Стимул-l' против трихофитии крупного рогатого скота
Developing of a vaccine 'Trichovak-Stimul-l' against bovine trichophitosis
Developing of a vaccine 'Trichovak-Stimul-l' against bovine trichophitosis

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Lazovskij, V.A., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies data of an experimental work on developing an alive dry vaccine against bovine trichophitosis 'Trichovak-Stimul-1' which was spent in 'Vitebsk biofactory', Central Research Laboratory and laboratory of epizootology faculty of 'Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine'. For developing an alive dry vaccine against bovine trichophitosis 'Trichovak-Stimul-1' are used industrial vaccinal strains Trichophyton verrucosum TF-130L RSRDI and Trichophyton verrucosum 11183, received from the All-Russia State Centre for Quality and Standardization of Veterinary Drugs and Feed veterinary preparations, the All-Russian Research Institute for Experimental Veterinary Medicine n. a. Ya.R.Kovalenko. Results of biological product immunogenicity and reactivity studying are brought. Application of an alive dry vaccine 'Trichovak-Stimul-1' against bovine trichophitosis caused slight increase of a body temperature at immunizated animals which was restored for the fourth day of carrying out of experimental work. The satisfactory common condition of an organism testifies that the produced biological product is areactogenic.
